  input_tsv:
    label: "Input TSV file"

    input: text
---

```{r setup}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)

knit_print.data.frame <- function(x, ...) kable(x) %>% paste(collapse = "\n") %>% asis_output
input_tsv <- params$input_tsv

input_tsv
```

# Read data
```{r read}
depths <- read_table(input_tsv, col_types = "i")
```

# Boxplot statistics
```{r boxplot-statistics}
quartiles <- boxplot.stats(depths$Depth)$stats
upper_whisker <- quartiles[5]

quartiles
```

# Plot histogram
```{r depth-histogram}
ggplot(depths) +
	aes(x = Depth) +
	geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, boundary = 0) +
	geom_vline(xintercept = quartiles, colour = "grey", linetype = "dashed") +
	coord_cartesian(x = c(0, 1.2 * upper_whisker)) +
	theme_bw() +
	labs(caption = paste(quartiles, collapse = " "))
```

```{r save-plot}
ggsave(paste0(input_tsv, ".pdf"))
```
